results.content: Good instructor that reviews each point of compass and SASS usage together.
results.content_html: Good instructor that reviews each point of compass and SASS usage together.

results.content: Very quick and very raw introduction to Compass, but a useful quick look. Organisational order of lectures doesn't always make sense, and would be much better to work on one set of project files throughout.
results.content_html: Very quick and very raw introduction to Compass, but a useful quick look. Organisational order of lectures doesn't always make sense, and would be much better to work on one set of project files throughout.

results.content: I think it is great course, I learn how to use compass I think it is helpful in the near future.

results.content: Course will introduce compass to you. Specially, a lot of tips to speed up your develop time and improve website performance. It's an interesting course with hilarious teacher!
results.content_html: Course will introduce compass to you. Specially, a lot of tips to speed up your develop time and improve website performance. It's an interesting course with hilarious teacher!

results.content: The Compass course content was clear and informative, and Arkadiusz, the instructor, does a nice job of showing what is most useful and what is not. The setup and installation was a little tricky, but I don't think that takes away from the knowledge offered in this course - if anything, it probably helped me to learn a few other new things.
results.content_html: The Compass course content was clear and informative, and Arkadiusz, the instructor, does a nice job of showing what is most useful and what is not. The setup and installation was a little tricky, but I don't think that takes away from the knowledge offered in this course - if anything, it probably helped me to learn a few other new things.

results.content: Always think it's strange when these courses are windows based.   Also felt like it was sort of jumping around and not cohesive.

response.content:
Hello,

Thanks for your feedback Jim. It is known beforehand that this course is based on Windows. I always give free preview lectures. Could you precise what was not cohesive in my course? Was it really so bad that you rated it only 2 stars? You watched 100% of lectures so it had to be valuable if you had spent your precious time watching my course. If you have any questions feel free to ask! 

Best regards,

Arkadiusz W.
